987910.name: WarZone Flashpoint
987910.description:
WarZone Flashpoint is an RTS. We're building it from the ground up and we want you to enlist you! Manage your economy and combat assets to out think and out micro your opponents. Master a wide variety of units, structures, technologies, and powers to bring down your opponents or make a clutch move to save an ally. Directional armor, infantry cover, and nuanced upgrades offer deep gameplay that will keep you playing for a long time.

The current alpha build includes Onslaught, a hold-out style game mode where you fight against invading forces. Expect frequent updates to the game as we move development forward with the help of our community involvement!
987910.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
